```{r setup}
library(lineaGT)
```


```{r}
x_fit = data_filt %>% dplyr::select(starts_with("cov")) %>% 
  fit(lineages=list("L1","L2","L3","L4"), IS_values=data_filt$IS, steps=500, n_runs=2, k_interval=c(10,15))
```
